name: RandMeme
short: Get a random meme from Reddit.
description: Get a random meme from Reddit and see stats of that post.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.

Thank you for installing the RandMeme cog by <@572944636209922059> :D 
This cog gets a random meme from Reddit.
